text: Lawrence N. "Larry" Seilhamer Rodríguez (born December 13, 1954) is a Puerto Rican politician. He is a member of the New Progressive Party (PNP). He was a member of the Senate of Puerto Rico from January 7, 2009 until January 15, 2020.Senado se despide de Larry Seilhamer. MagazinePuertoRico.com 13 January 2020. Accessed 21 February 2020. In 2021, he became the Secretary of State of Puerto Rico. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Secretaries of state of Puerto Rico Category:Basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Puerto Rico
title: Larry Seilhamer Rodríguez
